players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "Based on my investigation, I believe Alice is the mafioso. We should vote for them to ensure our safety."
Diana: "Based on the fact that Charlie was killed, I think we should focus on finding out who the mafioso is. We can't just assume it's Alice based on Bob's investigation alone."
Diana: "I think we should have a discussion about the events of night one and see if anyone else has any information or insights to share."
You: "I have no information to share. I will remain silent."

players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "Based on my investigation, I believe Alice is the mafioso. We should vote for them to ensure our safety."
Diana: "Based on the fact that Charlie was killed, I think we should focus on finding out who the mafioso is. We can't just assume it's Alice based on Bob's investigation alone."
Diana: "I think we should have a discussion about the events of night one and see if anyone else has any information or insights to share."
Alice: "I have no information to share. I will remain silent."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
